page.title: 19Transport
page.content: The whole valley only has one bus a week on a Friday, when the Kendal to Ambleside bus deviates for one return journey. The Mountain Goat private vus collects school children and also runs visits for special reasons, carnivals etc. find the contours a bit trying. Private means of transport are a necessity and there are cars attached to most houses, Land Rovers for the farms, and one local taxi for hire. On many of the minor roads where two vehicles could not pass there are widened parts at intervals so that one driver can wait with safety.
